channel.description: Recent content in Urinary Tract Stones on Urologist | Dr. Yen-Ting Wu

item.title: Going on vacation, how to take care of your urinary system?
item.description: 1. Avoid driving for long periods without rest or water intake If you go for a long time without drinking water, especially in hot weather, you might be at risk of urinary tract infections or stone pain.

item.title: What is a cystoscope?
item.description: What is a cystoscope? Similar to endoscopes for other organs such as panendoscopes for examining the stomach and small intestine, and colonoscopes for examining the rectum and colon, a cystoscope is used to inspect the urethra and bladder.

item.title: The Latest Weapon in the Treatment of Urinary Tract Stones: Tip-Flexible Suctioning Sheath for Flexible Ureteroscope
item.description: Last week, the manufacturer of ureteroscope instruments invited Dr. Wu to try out a new surgical tool: the â€œTip-Flexible Suctioning Sheath for Flexible Ureteroscope"
